page.title: 15A FARMER'S WIFE AT HOME
page.content: I get up every morning at 6.30 and take a cup of tea before going out to bring the cows in for milking. My husband gets up shortly after 6.30 to milk the cows. The milking begins about 7.00 and finishes about 9.00. Meanwhile, I leave my daughter to the bus stop at 8.00 and then return home to get my breakfast ready. After breakfast, I feed the young calves with milk and go down to the fields to feed the older calves with meal. I then tend to the pigs, giving them meal and water and cleaning out their sty. After this I come back to the house, do the breakfast dishes and begin getting the dinner ready. In the afternoon I might do some gardening or mend some fencing if it is dry. If it is wet, I will do some cleaning in the house. Continued next page.
